headline: Klarna Takes Aim At Premium Credit Cards With Its New Membership Program
summary: For about $220, members will get media subscriptions and cash back; and for $540 a year, access to airport lounges, the buy now, pay later provider said.

headline: Jim Cramer on Mastercard: “You Can Put This One on Auto”

headline: American Express Declares Dividend on Series D Preferred Stock
summary: NEW YORK, October 27, 2025--The Board of Directors of American Express Company (NYSE: AXP) declared a quarterly dividend on the Company’s 3.550% Fixed Rate Reset Noncumulative Preferred Shares, Series D, of $8,973.61 per share (which is equivalent to $8.97361 per related Depositary Share).
